smg.text: Mainly cloudy. Light rain in the morning. Force 4 to 5 northerly winds, occasionally force 6 with gusts.
Temperature falling slightly. Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Force 3 to 5 north to northeasterly winds with gusts.
Dry. Mainly fine. Force 2 to 4 northeasterly winds.
Dry. Fine. Force 2 to 3 east to northeasterly winds.
Fine. Force 2 to 3 east to northeasterly winds.
Mainly fine. Force 2 to 3 northeasterly winds.
Mainly cloudy. A few rain patches. Force 3 to 4 easterly winds.
